price: 32. Waxay tidhi: Mudanayaal! Iga siiya talo arrinkaygaan. Anigu ma gooyo talo jeer aad goob joog tihiin9.
arabic: قَالَتۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ أَفۡتُونِي فِيٓ أَمۡرِي مَا كُنتُ قَاطِعَةً أَمۡرًا حَتَّىٰ تَشۡهَدُونِ
footnotes: 9. Inaad ila joogtaan maahee golaha wada tashiga (baarlamaanka), oo aad oggolaansho cad i siisaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālat yāayyuhā al-mala-u aftūnī fī amrī mā kuntu qāṭiʿatan amran ḥattā tashhadūni
